/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling construction site in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering cranes and buildings that dominate the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the earthy tones of the construction site below. The buildings under construction are tall and imposing, their skeletal structures reaching towards the sky. Cranes, symbols of progress and development, are scattered across the site, their long arms reaching out over the buildings. The ground is a patchwork of dirt and construction materials, a testament to the ongoing work. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the details of the construction site.
